sections.heading: Board; pool administrator; selection
sections.text: The director shall select the board. The board shall select a pool administrator pursuant to section 44-4223.SourceLaws 1985, LB 391, § 17;Laws 1989, LB 279, § 6;Laws 1992, LB 1006, § 31;Laws 2000, LB 1253, § 21;Laws 2011, LB73, § 1.
